thread.title: Countryfile presenter causes outrage after she 'draws picture of a penis in a sprinkling of flour'
thread.title_full: Countryfile presenter causes outrage after she 'draws picture of a penis in a sprinkling of flour'

author: Kara O'Neill
title: Countryfile presenter causes outrage after she 'draws picture of a penis in a sprinkling of flour'
text:
News Countryfile presenter causes outrage after she 'draws picture of a penis in a sprinkling of flour' Bewildered viewers thought Ellie Harrison had drawn a picture of something very rude indeed as she presented a segment on farming and baking Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Countryfile viewers hit Twitter over 'penis' drawn in flour Share this video Get   Countryfile presenter left viewers shocked when she appeared to draw a penis in flour during her segment on farming . 
Ellie Harrison was using a sprinkling of flour to draw an image of a baker's hat and a tractor. 
But some people watching at home spotted something a little more rude etched out in the white dust. 
Of course, it wasn't long before Twitter exploded with comments on Ellie's artistry, as the oblivious presenter informed viewers how a baker obtained locally produced Rye flour with the government's help. Some viewers were baffled by Ellie's artistry (Photo: Countryfile/BBC) The offending image (Photo: Countryfile/BBC) Read More 
One social media user wrote: "What's Ellie Harrison drawing in the flour?!" 
Another added: "Did Ellie just reveal the secret ingredient?" 
Thankfully, most viewers didn't jump to conclusions during the family show, realising immediately that the 'offending' image was actually just a chef's hat. Like us on Facebook
